TypeSignature.Value: public delegate TResult Func<in T1,in T2,in T3,in T4,in T5,in T6,in T7,in T8,out TResult>(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4, T5 arg5, T6 arg6, T7 arg7, T8 arg8);
.class public auto ansi sealed Func`9<- T1, - T2, - T3, - T4, - T5, - T6, - T7, - T8, + TResult> extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Function Func(Of In T1, In T2, In T3, In T4, In T5, In T6, In T7, In T8, Out TResult)(arg1 As T1, arg2 As T2, arg3 As T3, arg4 As T4, arg5 As T5, arg6 As T6, arg7 As T7, arg8 As T8) As TResult

generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6, typename T7, typename T8, typename TResult> public delegate TResult Func(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4, T5 arg5, T6 arg6, T7 arg7, T8 arg8);

span.span: The first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

summary.span: 封装一个方法，该方法具有八个参数，并返回 参数所指定的类型的值。

span.span: Encapsulates a method that has eight parameters and returns a value of the type specified by the parameter.

returns.span: 此委托封装的方法的返回值。

span.span: The return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此委托来表示一个方法，该方法可作为参数传递，而无需显式声明自定义委托。You can use this delegate to represent a method that can be passed as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate. 封装的方法必须对应于由此委托定义的方法签名。The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate. 这意味着封装的方法必须具有八个参数，每个参数都按值传递给它，并且必须返回一个值。This means that the encapsulated method must have eight parameters, each of which is passed to it by value, and that it must return a value. > [!NOTE] > 若要引用具有八个参数并返回 `void` (或 Visual Basic 中的方法（声明为 `Sub` 而不是 `Function`) ），请改用泛型 委托。To reference a method that has eight parameters and returns `void` (or in Visual Basic, that is declared as a `Sub` rather than as a `Function`), use the generic delegate instead. 还可以将 委托与匿名方法和 lambda 表达式一起使用。You can also use the delegate with anonymous methods and lambda expressions. Lambda 表达式的基础类型是一个泛型 `Func` 委托。The underlying type of a lambda expression is one of the generic `Func` delegates. 这样，便可以将 lambda 表达式作为参数传递，而无需将其显式分配给委托。This makes it possible to pass a lambda expression as a parameter without explicitly assigning it to a delegate.
